backend/main.mo: Actor implementing access-controlled user profiles, radio stream checks, request logging, and push subscription storage using maps and HTTP outcalls.

frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and shortcuts.

frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing navigation, audio playback state, service worker recovery, and global providers like React Query.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: Chromecast control button that starts or stops casting the stream and shows casting status.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA install prompt handling logic for Android, iOS, and desktop with deferred prompts and platform-specific guides.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a fixed bottom tab bar with Home, Shows, and Settings tabs and handles tab switching.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: Shows a compact media player with album art, scrolling title, play/pause control, and tap-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Provides an auto-scrolling marquee for long track titles with reduced‑motion and interaction pause handling.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Implements a volume slider synced to an audio element and updates volume on change.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel that lets users enable or view subscription status for push notifications with error handling.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form for submitting song or shoutout requests with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner notifying users about service worker errors or updates with actions to refresh or reset the app.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using the Web Share API with a fallback modal for copying the app link to clipboard.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show info including image, description, genres, and schedule in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red animated LIVE badge with a radio icon.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: Renders a small pulsing dot indicating on‑air status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled now-playing notification with icons, colors, and optional dismiss support based on notification type.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides a list of mock show objects with metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles playback recovery on visibility changes, page restores, and focus events, attempting to auto‑resume audio or signal manual resume.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Checks body background-image after mount and logs a warning if missing or failed to load.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Manages Chromecast API initialization, session handling, device availability, and casting state for a provided stream URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Tracks and toggles a user's favorite station flag using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, managing login/logout, and exposing login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Measures text and container widths to decide overflow and compute marquee animation properties with retries and remount keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Watches now-playing metadata to detect track, mix, or live changes and triggers browser notifications with deduping.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Handles subscribing and unsubscribing to push notifications using the service worker, VAPID key, and backend storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching the stream URL with fallbacks, checking stream availability, fetching now-playing data, and submitting requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Implements service worker registration, update handling, reset logic, and state management for registration readiness and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Provides a countdown sleep timer that pauses an audio element after a set duration with start and cancel controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Manages screen wake lock requests and releases based on activity, including visibility-change reactivation and cleanup.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and responsive background images with image-set fallbacks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of mock shows by genre and day, rendering ShowCards and allowing selection or filter resets.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: A live radio home screen showing station info, playback status, and a main play/pause button with error and loading handling.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays detailed now-playing info with album art, playback controls, volume, and a sleep timer.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings screen providing notification controls and a background image refresh feature with cache clearing.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Shows detailed info about a selected radio show with image, schedule, genres, and an option to download a calendar event.

frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility for safe Google Analytics event tracking, including play, pause, and casting events.

frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Cleans and validates artwork URLs, converting them to absolute HTTPS paths or returning null if invalid.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
